name: Once Upon a Time in a Jam
name_original: Once Upon a Time in a Jam
description: Once upon a Jam is game that tells the story of 2 game developers of Green Side Studios participating on Game Zanga Jam , for the chosen theme " Parallel Universe " , while making the game they end up in their game ideas and prototype , each one consisting of a theme and representing a different parrallel universe ( space shooter - point & click - pixel art platformer - puzzle game ) , the Game takes the player through these 4 universes where he plays as the 2 devs in hopes of helping them find their own way back into their own world .
